ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
While the police search Spawn's alleys looking for Cyan's kidnapper, Wynn directs a surveillance of his own on Terry with orders to find out why the police are looking for him. Spawn then finds Cyan and the Clown who taunts him into a battle. After Spawn uses up a portion of his energy to destroy the Clown, he brings Cyan to her parents.
ComicInfo.Teams: Central Intelligence Agency,New York Police Department,Hellspawn
ComicInfo.Title: Dwarfed
